block.p: GRAFF-Joseph. Beloved husband of Ruth. Devoted father of Robert, Janet Marcus and Lori Harris. Cherished grandfather of Lisa Glover, Christopher Marcus, Bari Schlessinger, Jason Graff, Jonathan Marcus, Drew Harris, Bret Harris and Ricki Harris. Adored greatgrandfather of Mereck Glover, Hannah Schlessinger and Casey Glover. Loving brother of Gilda Kronen. Services ''BoulevardRiverside,'' 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, L.I., 9:30 AM, Wednesday.
